results.name: Decimal expansion of the sum of the reciprocals of the multiply-perfect numbers.
comment: The first 18 terms were calculated by Bayless and Kinlaw (2015).
link: Jonathan Bayless and Paul Kinlaw, On repeated values of sigma and multiperfect numbers, Journal of Combinatorics and Number Theory, Vol. 7, No. 3 (2015), pp. 177-189.
results.author: _Amiram Eldar_, Jun 25 2020
ext: More terms (computed using the b-file at A007691) from _Jon E. Schoenfield_, Jan 25 2021
